sections.heading: of act.The Managed Care Emergency Services Act applies to all health carriers that offer managed care plans

sections.text:
44-6828.Applicability of act.

The Managed Care Emergency Services Act applies to all health carriers that offer managed care plans.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 279, § 20;R.S.Supp.,1997, § 44-6820;Laws 1998, LB 1162, § 20.
